changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO sample_sequencingobject (sample_id, sequencingobject_id, created_date) SELECT DISTINCT ss.sample_id, p.pair_id, MIN(ss.createdDate) FROM sequencefile_sample ss INNER JOIN sequence_file_pair_files p ON p.files_id=ss.sequencefile_id GROUP BY p.pair_id, ss.sample_id;

INSERT INTO sample_sequencingobject (sample_id, sequencingobject_id, created_date) SELECT ss.sample_id, f.id, ss.createdDate FROM sequencefile_sample ss INNER JOIN sequence_file_single_end f ON ss.sequencefile_id=f.file_id

INSERT INTO sample_sequencingobject_AUD (id, REV, REVTYPE, created_date, sample_id, sequencingobject_id) SELECT DISTINCT ss.id, ssa.REV, ssa.REVTYPE, ssa.createdDate, ssa.sample_id, ss.sequencingobject_id FROM sample_sequencingobject ss INNER JOIN sequence_file_pair_files pf ON pf.pair_id=ss.sequencingobject_id INNER JOIN sequencefile_sample_AUD ssa ON ssa.sequencefile_id=pf.files_id GROUP BY ss.id, ssa.id, ssa.REV

INSERT INTO sample_sequencingobject_AUD (id, REV, REVTYPE, created_date, sample_id, sequencingobject_id) SELECT ss.id, ssa.REV, ssa.REVTYPE, ssa.createdDate, ssa.sample_id, ss.sequencingobject_id FROM sample_sequencingobject ss INNER JOIN sequence_file_single_end pf ON pf.id=ss.sequencingobject_id INNER JOIN sequencefile_sample_AUD ssa ON ssa.sequencefile_id=pf.file_id GROUP BY ss.id, ssa.id, ssa.REV
